com.untamedears.contraptions.utility

Class Resource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.untamedears.contraptions.utility.Resource

  • public class Resource
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a resource of a single Contraption

      • safeChange

        public double safeChange(double change,
                double minimum,
                double maximum)
        Changes the resource while garunteeing it will stay in a given range
        Parameters:
        change - Amount to change the resource by
        minimum - Minimum value of the resource
        maximum - Maximum value of the resource
        Returns:
        The amount the resource was unable to change
